languages.text: "История со стражем Летуса бросает тень на мою династию, но я хочу, чтобы ты знал — я вер{mf|ен|на} закону Императора".
"The matter of the watcher of Leethus has cast a shadow over my dynasty, but I want you to know: I am loyal to the Emperor's Law."
languages.original_text: "История со стражем Летуса бросает тень на мою династию, но я хочу, чтобы ты знал — я вер{mf|ен|на} закону Императора".

traits.locale_text: "The matter of the watcher of Leethus cast a shadow on my dynasty, but I want you to know: I am loyal to the Emperor's law."
"The matter of the watcher of Leethus cast a shadow on my dynasty, but I want you to know: I am loyal to the Emperor's law."
"The matter of the watcher of Leethus has cast a shadow over my dynasty, but I want you to know: I am loyal to the Emperor's law."
"The matter of the watcher of Leethus has cast a shadow over my dynasty, but I want you to know: I am loyal to the Emperor's law."
"The matter of the watcher of Leethus has cast a shadow over my dynasty, but I want you to know: I am loyal to the Emperor's Law."
"The matter of the watcher of Leethus has cast a shadow over my dynasty, but I want you to know: I am loyal to the Emperor's Law."

languages.text: 「リーザスの監視者に関する件は、{mf|俺|私}の王朝に影を落とした。だが知っておいてほしい。{mf|俺|私}は皇帝陛下の法に忠実だ」
languages.original_text: "The matter of the watcher of Leethus has cast a shadow over my dynasty, but I want you to know: I am loyal to the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: 「リーザスの監視者に関する件は、{mf|俺|私}の王朝に影を落とした。だが知っておいてほしい。{mf|俺|私}は皇帝陛下の法に忠実だ」

languages.text: "Die Angelegenheit mit dem Wächter von Leethus hat einen Schatten auf meine Dynastie geworfen, aber eines sollt Ihr wissen. Ich bin dem Gesetz des Imperators treu ergeben."
languages.original_text: "The matter of the watcher of Leethus has cast a shadow over my dynasty, but I want you to know: I am loyal to the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: "Die Angelegenheit mit dem Wächter von Leethus hat einen Schatten auf meine Dynastie geworfen, aber eines sollt Ihr wissen. Ich bin dem Gesetz des Imperators treu ergeben."

languages.text: « L'affaire du gardien de Leethus a quelque peu terni l'image de ma dynastie, mais je souhaitais vous rassurer : ma loyauté à l'Empereur est indéfectible. »
languages.original_text: "The matter of the watcher of Leethus has cast a shadow over my dynasty, but I want you to know: I am loyal to the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: « L'affaire du gardien de Leethus a quelque peu terni l'image de ma dynastie, mais je souhaitais vous rassurer : ma loyauté à l'Empereur est indéfectible. »
« L'affaire du gardien de Leethus a quelque peu terni l'image de ma dynastie, mais je souhaitais vous rassurer : ma loyauté à l'Empereur est indéfectible. »

languages.text: «La cuestión del vigilante de Leethus ha proyectado una negra sombra sobre mi dinastía, pero quiero que sepa que soy fiel a las leyes del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "The matter of the watcher of Leethus has cast a shadow over my dynasty, but I want you to know: I am loyal to the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: «La cuestión del vigilante de Leethus ha proyectado una negra sombra sobre mi dinastía, pero quiero que sepa que soy fiel a las leyes del Emperador».

languages.text: “利瑟斯守望者的事情让我的王朝蒙上了阴影，但我希望你能明白，我忠于帝皇的律法。”
languages.original_text: "The matter of the watcher of Leethus has cast a shadow over my dynasty, but I want you to know: I am loyal to the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: “利瑟斯守望者的事情让我的王朝蒙上了阴影，但我希望你能明白，我忠于帝皇的律法。”

languages.text: "Leethus gözcüsü meselesi, hanedanlığımın üzerine gölge düşürdü ancak bilmeni isterim ki mevzubahis İmparator'un Yasası olduğunda sadakatten kusur etmem."
languages.original_text: "The matter of the watcher of Leethus has cast a shadow over my dynasty, but I want you to know: I am loyal to the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: "Leethus gözcüsü meselesi, hanedanlığımın üzerine gölge düşürdü ancak bilmeni isterim ki mevzubahis İmparator'un Yasası olduğunda sadakatten kusur etmem."
"Leethus gözcüsü meselesi, hanedanlığımın üzerine gölge düşürdü ancak bilmeni isterim ki mevzubahis İmparator'un kanunları olduğunda sadakatten kusur etmem."
